name: @davidsneighbour/netlify-plugin-hugo-helper
description: A Netlify plugin with helper functions for GoHugo deploys.
author: Patrick Kollitsch <patrick@davids-neighbour.com>

scripts.release:major: commit-and-tag-version --release-as major --sign -a -t "v" --releaseCommitMessageFormat "chore(release): v{{currentTag}}" && git push --follow-tags origin main && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: commit-and-tag-version --release-as minor --sign -a -t "v" --releaseCommitMessageFormat "chore(release): v{{currentTag}}" && git push --follow-tags origin main && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: commit-and-tag-version --release-as patch --sign -a -t "v" --releaseCommitMessageFormat "chore(release): v{{currentTag}}" && git push --follow-tags origin main && npm publish
